dict.string: I have truthfully represented to <BusinessName> STUDIO that I am over eighteen (18) years of age.

I acknowledge that it is not reasonably possible for the representatives and employees of <BusinessName> STUDIO to determine whether I might have an allergic reaction to the processes used in my piercing, and I agree to accept the risk that such a reaction is possible.

I acknowledge that I have advised my piercer of any condition that might affect the healing of this piercing. I do not have medical or skin conditions such as but not limited to: acne, scarring, keloid, eczema, psoriasis, freckles, moles, or sunburn in the area to be pierced that may interfere with said piercing. If I have any type of infection or rash anywhere on my body, I will advise the piercer.
I am not pregnant or nursing.
I am not under the influence of alcohol or drugs.

I acknowledge that infection is always possible as a result of obtaining a piercing, particularly in the event that I do not take proper care of my piercing. I have received aftercare instructions and I agree to follow them while my piercing is healing. I agree that any touch-up work needed, due to my own negligence, will be done at my own expense. This includes sun and ultraviolet frequency damage.

I acknowledge that a piercing is a change to my appearance and that no representations have been made to me as to the ability to later change or remove my piercing. To my knowledge, I do not have physical, mental or medical impairment or disability which might affect my well being as a direct or indirect result of my decision to have a piercing.
I acknowledge the decision for obtaining my piercing is my own free will and choice. I consent to the location of the piercing and the performance of the piercing procedure.
I acknowledge and agree to following any and all instructions provided to me regarding the maintenance of a sanitary environment during the piercing process.
I agree that the piercing is correctly located to my specifications.

I agree to IMMEDIATELY notify the piercer if I feel lightheaded, dizzy and/or faint before, during or after the procedure. Failure to do so releases <BusinessName> STUDIO and my piercer of all responsibility.
